mapper.insert: insert into reply (bno, replytext, replyer, secretReply) values (#{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer}, #{secretReply})
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, replytext, replyer, r.regdate, r.updatedate, secretReply, m.user_name, (SELECT writer FROM board WHERE bno = r.bno) AS writer FROM reply r LEFT JOIN user m on r.replyer = m.user_id WHERE r.replyer = m.user_id AND bno=#{bno} ORDER BY rno
SELECT rno, bno, replytext, replyer, regdate, updatedate, secretReply FROM reply WHERE rno = #{rno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reply WHERE bno = #{bno}
